name: LookMazing
overview:
LookMazing is a fashion social network that rewards individuals for transforming outfit photos into shoppable looks.

LookMazing enables members to upload photos of their outfits and utilizes an automated tagging functionality based on brand and item keywords to identify products featured in the photo. Currently, LookMazing can search across over 130 retailers to find exact or similar products. Those interested can then easily click on any featured product to purchase it.

The network’s features focus on changing the way trendsetters, shoppers, and retailers connect.
